title: The Prophets: Pont-Aven, the Nabis and Toulouse-Lautrec
creator_credit: Pierre Alibert, International Film Bureau and Les Films du Cypres
brief_description: Works of the “Nabis” - Vuillard, Serusler, Ranson, Roussel and Bonnard, whose basic principle was that the picture is not a description and should differ from the model. Compares the “Nabis” with Toulouse-Lautrec to show how both confirmed change in painting and helped open the way for modern painting. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
